channel.title: Changing Ip Wont Work For Me
channel.description: when i keep the server's the ip to 0.0.0.0 then compile and open my server i can log in... but when i want to change it to my ip I can't log in neither can anyone esle... I went to CanYouSeeMe.Org and it says my ports open... But i can't log in What do you guys think is wronge ?!?! [IMG]http://i1181.photobucket.com/albums/x424/Yasin_Sheikh/Porton.jpg[/img]

item.title: Changing Ip Wont Work For Me
item.dc:creator: @Ceo123 Ceo123
item.description:
@Ceo123 wrote:

I did all that i changed 125.0.0.1 to my ip then gave it out to my friends and they said it wont work for them. Then i tried it on my computer and it said “Error connecting to server.” So both my friends and me can log in, but when i change it back im the only one that can log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Ip Wont Work For Me

item.title: Changing Ip Wont Work For Me
item.dc:creator: @DynastyRSPS DynastyRSPS
item.description:
@DynastyRSPS wrote:

Well if you want to give out your client, make a copy of the folder then you’re going to need to change client.java, search for “127.0.0.1” then change that to your no-ip, then, you’re also going to need to compile the client, once that’s done, delete all of the .java files in your client, delete the compile.bat, .rar the client, upload it to uppit.com then give out the link, make sure the server is on, and your no-ip is running on your desktop.

In that case, you are finished.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Ip Wont Work For Me
